document.full_text: in a smart publicity stunt, a leading charity has traded on rumors about carla bruni-sarkozy's possible pregnancy to try and save lives of babies in the developing world.
document.title: charity pulls smart stunt on bruni pregnancy rumour
lines_and_colors: in a smart publicity stunt, a leading charity has traded on rumors about carla bruni-sarkozy's possible pregnancy to try and save lives of babies in the developing world.
